item.title: Setting up Python based AWS Lambdas for web scraping
Setting up a CI/CD pipeline using Gitlab, Terraform and AWS
item.description: I recently setup a CI/CD pipeline using Gitlab Terraform and AWS. This post explains the various parts.

item.title: This site setup
item.description: This site is built using a framework called Hugo, which is a static site generator. I now have it setup using github actions to automatically re-build the static pages whenever I push code to my Github repo.
